reviewtext: I am buying the Rebel T4i with the default 18-55 lens. I am looking for an additional lens for a bit longer range. I am leaning towards this model but also came across this one "Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens for Canon Digital SLR Cameras" Could someone please illustrate the differences between these models?
